_sText:
Hi,

I have installed the following properties on the map ba_Jail_modern_mini.

Rooms:

- Healraum
- Armory & Small Control Room
- Small Pool
- Football field (Jard)
- Bulk Jail
- Kitchen

The following rooms weapons are hidden:

- Small pool in the pool in the lower right corner (P228)
(use the sofa to get to the bell) Massenjail on top of the camera -
- In two cells are weapons (P228) 1x and 1x top down
- In two cells are smoke grenades (1x 1x top down)

The following rooms have bay access:

- In two cells above 1x and 1x below.
- In the Healroom
- In the pool
- In the armory
- In Massenjail

In Massenjail still is a small separate room where a M249 and a bomb. The bomb can not be placed on the map.

On the map is an alarm system installed which can only be used by the counter terrorists. The doors all automatically. They are controlled by triggers. The armory door can only be used by the counter terrorists.

On the map there are 20 terrorists and 12 launch sites Counter terrorists launch sites.

Sry i used Google.de Translator :P
